title: Document a Walkthrough Narrative
description: An auditor must formally document their understanding of the payroll process in a workpaper narrative.

tasks.description: Based on interview notes, write a step-by-step description of the payroll process, from employee time entry to payment disbursement.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear narrative of the process is drafted.

tasks.description: Identify and embed key controls within the narrative, such as 'Manager review and approval of employee timesheets'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The narrative clearly indicates the key control points in the process.

tasks.description: Send the draft narrative to the Payroll Manager to confirm its accuracy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditee confirms that the auditor's understanding of the process is correct.
